channel.title: PerkScape | 24/7 | Skilling, PvP, and More! | Great Staff | HIRING
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Download With Cache:[/size] http://perkforum.com/PerkScape.7z (400+MB) [size=24pt]Download Without Cache:[/size] http://perkforum.com/PerkScape2.7z (~1MB)
[size=24pt]Gallery:[/size] http://imgur.com/a/4hWVD
Just download that, open it with 7zip and follow the instructions text file!
This is a 718 source (Lost-Realm) edited a small bit. Just come on and hang out with us!

item.title: PerkScape | 24/7 | Skilling, PvP, and More! | Great Staff | HIRING
item.dc:creator: @junkfroggy junkfroggy
item.description:
@junkfroggy wrote:

[quote=“junkfroggy, post:4, topic:541863”][quote author=PvPKid0rg link=topic=660734.msg4417416#msg4417416 date=1396573439]
432 mb df :L
[/quote]

It includes the cache, as the server hosting the cache files seems to send them slowly.[/quote]

There is now a version without the cache included.

Read full topic
